p: The SOC levels were expected to decrease in only two cases (10%) as a result of implementing adaptation options. For example, using the CLIMSAVE Integrated Assessment Platform, Holman, Harrison, and Metzger ( 2016) identified adaptation options for NE Scotland (UK). The options included an expansion of the agricultural area and conversion of extensive permanent grassland to ley grassland and arable land due to expected increases in T and reduced summer wetness limitations by 2050.
